title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
description: We're seeking a talented Senior Full Stack Engineer to join our growing team. You'll work on cutting-edge projects that impact millions of users worldwide. Our tech stack includes React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL, deployed on AWS infrastructure.
requirements: 5+ years of professional software development experience
Strong proficiency in TypeScript/JavaScript and React
Experience with Node.js and RESTful API development
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Strong understanding of software architecture and design patterns
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience
notes: This role offers great growth opportunities and the chance to work with cutting-edge technologies.
